DataElement.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Bisphophonates Less Than 30 Days Prior To Study Drug First Administration Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the patient started receiving bisphosphonates less than 30 days prior to the first administration study drug.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Bisonphophonates Less Than 30 Days Prior To Study Drug First Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._A drug or substance used to treat hypercalcemia (abnormally high blood calcium) and bone pain caused by some types of cancer. Forms of bisphosphonates are also used to treat osteoporosis and for bone imaging. Bisphosphonates inhibit a type of bone cell that breaks down bone._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than twenty-nine and less than thirty-one and the quantity that it denotes._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredName: Biphosphonate Less Than Thirty Day Prior To Clinical Study Agent First Administration
Property.preferredDefinition: A drug or substance used to treat hypercalcemia (abnormally high blood calcium) and bone pain caused by some types of cancer. Forms of bisphosphonates are also used to treat osteoporosis and for bone imaging. Bisphosphonates inhibit a type of bone cell that breaks down bone.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A natural number greater than twenty-nine and less than thirty-one and the quantity that it denotes.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

Concepts.definition: A drug or substance used to treat hypercalcemia (abnormally high blood calcium) and bone pain caused by some types of cancer. Forms of bisphosphonates are also used to treat osteoporosis and for bone imaging. Bisphosphonates inhibit a type of bone cell that breaks down bone.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than twenty-nine and less than thirty-one and the quantity that it denotes.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient started recei
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient started receiving bisphosphonates less than 30 days prior to the first administration study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Heart Condition with Treatment
ReferenceDocuments.description: Ischemic myocardial event, including  angina requiring therapy  and artery revascularization procedures

ReferenceDocuments.name: Brain Condition with Treatment
ReferenceDocuments.description: Ischemic cerebrovascular event, including TIA and artery revascularization procedures

ReferenceDocuments.name: Treatment for Heart Condition
ReferenceDocuments.description: Requirement for inotropic support (excluding digoxin) or serious (uncontrolled) cardiac arrhythmia (including atrial flutter/fibrillation, ventricular fibrillation or ventricular tachycardia)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Heart Treatment
ReferenceDocuments.description: Placement of a pacemaker for control of rhythm

ReferenceDocuments.name: Heart Condition
ReferenceDocuments.description: New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class III or IV heart failure (See Appendix II)
